Title: My Projects
Subtitle: A showcase of my work and the technologies I've used to bring ideas to life.

Projects.Title: E-commerce Platform
Projects.Description: A modern e-commerce platform built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Features include product search, filtering, shopping cart, payment gateway integration, and admin dashboard.

Projects.Title: Task Management App
Projects.Description: A productivity application for task management with features like task creation, assignment, due dates, priority levels, and progress tracking.

Projects.Title: Recipe Finder Portal
Projects.Description: A web application that allows users to search for recipes based on ingredients, dietary restrictions, and meal types. Includes favorites, meal planning, and shopping list features.

Projects.Title: Real Estate Listings
Projects.Description: A property listing website that allows real estate agents to post properties and users to search, filter, and contact agents about listings.

Projects.Title: Fitness Tracking Mobile App
Projects.Description: A mobile application for tracking workouts, nutrition, and progress towards fitness goals. Features include exercise library, custom workout plans, and progress visualization.

Projects.Title: Content Management System
Projects.Description: A custom CMS built for a digital magazine, allowing editors to create, edit, and schedule articles with a rich text editor and media management.

Projects.Title: Budget Tracking Dashboard
Projects.Description: A financial dashboard that helps users track income, expenses, and savings goals. Features include expense categorization, budget setting, and data visualization.

Projects.Title: Inventory Management System
Projects.Description: A comprehensive inventory management solution for small businesses, with features like product tracking, stock alerts, supplier management, and sales reporting.

Projects.Title: Social Media Dashboard
Projects.Description: A unified dashboard for managing multiple social media accounts, including post scheduling, analytics, and engagement monitoring.
